attributes.action: remove the rule that gay men, or men who have had sex with men, or women that have had sex with (said) men cannot give blood via the transfusion service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i feel the rule for the tranfusion service is ridiculous, as a gay man i gave blood upto the point of having sex with a man.  Since then i have restricted this practice although i want to.

I cannot understand why straight men and women can give blood freely without this stigma, as all blood is tested and surely risks are now equally available and distributed within all communitites?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
